EmailTemplate.subject: Your Project {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Project_Name__c} is Stopping
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Your {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Stopped_At_Span__c} Project Leader {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Stopped_By__c} has chosen to stop {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Parent_Project_Name__c} in {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_StoppedByProjectPhase__c}. This will take affect {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_ProjectStoppedDatetime__c} at which time your project {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Project_Name__c} will also be stopped. If you believe this to be an error please contact your {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Stopped_At_Span__c} Project Leader - {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_Stopped_By__c} can reverse this decision before {!IPM_Project__c.IPM_ProjectStoppedDatetime__c}.
